snippet: Debevoise & Plimpton has named Mary Beth Hogan as co-chair of its litigation department, a job that was formerly held by Mary Jo White, now the chairwoman of the Securities and Exchange Commission.
abstract: Debevoise & Plimpton has named Mary Beth Hogan as co-chair of its litigation department, a job that was formerly held by Mary Jo White, now the chairwoman of the Securities and Exchange Commission.

headline.main: With White at S.E.C., Debevoise Picks a Successor
